title: abilities bug
body:
Seeing as i have to be level 6 to post in the report a bug section(yes after multiple attempts of going back in and trying to submit) i am having issues upon loading into a match where i cannot use abilities i can select to use them but i cannot use my keyboard to cast abilitie; and even sometimes my sound wont play either.
i usually have to restart my client multiple times to have them start working again and recently i started having them go out during the middle of my matches which sends me into full tilt mode and then i start getting flamed and only makes me want to flame back.

the bug that happened when it was going out during my matches seemed to be when i died i would alt tab to switch music or something else and then i would respawn and be ability less this is extremely inferiorating especially when iv googled for help and seen posts as far back as 2012 with issues similar to mine and no fix. please help me so i dont get banned for being toxic

replies.body:
The fact that this happens when you *Alt+Tab* during a match leads me to believe this may be caused by a background application that's interfering with your hotkeys. I recommend [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to ensure another program can't cause this.

Let me know if the clean boot helped.
